locations: Columbus Circle, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA::(Columbus Circle NYC)
imdb.plot outline: On August 9th, 2014 a rally supporting the people in Gaza took place at Columbus Circle in NYC. The rally lasted for 2 hours which was followed by a march to the United Nations. Prior to the rally starting, I was approached by Chris Hedges who mentioned that he had written a 8 minute speech that he wanted to deliver to the thousands of people attending the rally. However, he was told that all of the speakers were being limited to 2 minutes speaking time at the rally. This is that special speech that Chris Hedges wanted to deliver that day. He talked about the historical and religious background to what is the re-occurring violence in the area that the Israelis and Palestinians presently live in.
imdb.title: Chris Hedges, God's Covenant in the Promised Land: A Progressive Voice
akas: Chris Hedges, God's Covenant in the Promised Land: A Progressive Voice (United States)
